mapper.sql: ${alias}.id, ${alias}.version, ${alias}.user_id as userId, ${alias}.room_id as roomId, ${alias}.check_in as checkIn, ${alias}.check_out as checkOut, ${alias}.stat, ${alias}.status, ${alias}.remark, ${alias}.creator, ${alias}.creator_id as creatorId, ${alias}.created_time as createdTime, ${alias}.last_operator as lastOperator, ${alias}.last_operator_id as lastOperatorId, ${alias}.update_time as updateTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
, site.site_name as siteName, area.area_name as areaName, building.building_name as buildingName, building.building_no as buildingName, room.room_name as roomName, room.room_no as roomNo, room.unit_no as unitNo, room.floor_no as flooNo, room.room_type as roomType, room.house_type as roomHouse, room.acreage FROM t_his_room his_room LEFT JOIN t_user user ON his_room.user_id = user.id LEFT JOIN t_room room ON his_room.room_id = room.id LEFT JOIN t_building building on room.building_id = building.id left join t_area area on building.area_id = area.id LEFT JOIN t_site site ON area.site_id = site.id WHERE 1 = 1
and user.user_name LIKE concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
ORDER BY area.update_time DESC
